body_html:
It's in $(bazel info output_base)/external/protobuf/BUILD, the "protobuf" rule. I'm not sure you can actually modify that. Another way might be to create a cc_library rule, which depends on that, and then making that a linkshare = 1 rule.
…
On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 10:30 AM, Patrick Nguyen ***@***.***> wrote: Hi Dan, it's in the protobuf library in third_party/protobuf. I'll try to take a look later and give you the full path On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 6:45 AM, Dan Barnes ***@***.***> wrote: > We are having trouble finding the right place to insert linkshared in the > BUILD files for this to be successful. Is there any chance you could point > us to the right place to set "linkshared = 1" to load protobuf as a shared > library? > > Thanks for your help > > — > You are receiving this because you were mentioned. > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub > <#8403 (comment)>, > or mute the thread > <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_Sbb_QyEtgt52qIfU5AWYpZm2TJbnOks5rmo50gaJpZM4Mc-QB> > . >
body_text:
It's in $(bazel info output_base)/external/protobuf/BUILD, the
"protobuf" rule. I'm not sure you can actually modify that. Another
way might be to create a cc_library rule, which depends on that, and
then making that a linkshare = 1 rule.
…
On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 10:30 AM, Patrick Nguyen ***@***.***> wrote:
 Hi Dan, it's in the protobuf library in third_party/protobuf. I'll try to
 take a look later and give you the full path

 On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 6:45 AM, Dan Barnes ***@***.***>
 wrote:

> We are having trouble finding the right place to insert linkshared in the
> BUILD files for this to be successful. Is there any chance you could point
> us to the right place to set "linkshared = 1" to load protobuf as a shared
> library?
>
> Thanks for your help
>

body:
It's in $(bazel info output_base)/external/protobuf/BUILD, the
"protobuf" rule. I'm not sure you can actually modify that. Another
way might be to create a cc_library rule, which depends on that, and
then making that a linkshare = 1 rule.


On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 10:30 AM, Patrick Nguyen <drpng@google.com> wrote:

> Hi Dan, it's in the protobuf library in third_party/protobuf. I'll try to
> take a look later and give you the full path
>
> On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 6:45 AM, Dan Barnes <notifications@github.com>
> wrote:
>
>> We are having trouble finding the right place to insert linkshared in the
>> BUILD files for this to be successful. Is there any chance you could point
>> us to the right place to set "linkshared = 1" to load protobuf as a shared
>> library?
>>
>> Thanks for your help
>>
>> —
